entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Point 2:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.3°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. 60 percent chance of showers near Zeballos and Tahsis overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
